android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETE.description: Allows an application to start itself as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the phone and allow the application to slow down the overall phone by always running.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

com.huawei.android.launcher.permission.W.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

com.oppo.launcher.permission.WRITE_SETTI.description: Allows an application to modify the system's settings data. Malicious applications can corrupt your system's configuration.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

playstore_details.title: Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise
playstore_details.description:
Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise is the most realistic hair cutter simulation app that you can prank all your friends! Use it end enjoy like a haircutter clipper, hair buzzer, hair trimmer. You can play a prank on all your friends and family. Scare them by pretending to shave their hair off! The app is only for entertainment purposes.

Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise will be a very fun tool: Hair Clipper, Hair Trimmer, Shaver - your phone vibrates repeatedly and buzzy sounds, the viewer wants you to have the possibility to make a real hair clipper, the camera will be loaded.  Make a joke with your friends and manage them Download and enjoy the trial, it will be great fun! 

Offering a real razor sound and vibration, this app turns your device into a real razor. You can operate the machine by tapping anywhere on the screen. Now is the time to surprise your friends! There are so many prank apps but this is one of the apps for jokes, perfect for entertainment and make some fun things by simulating hair trimmer, clippers, shaver.

Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise enables you to make jokes imitating perfectly the sound of a real clipper. If your phone supports it, the sound changes when you touch with the top of the phone (screen side) the head of your target. Increase the realism by showing a lock of hair to your victim. Joke and laughter guaranteed with this application.

This will be a really fun app like a game, extremely interesting entertainment:
- Your phone will vibrate continuously emits sound and hair cutting machine feels like you are holding a real hair clipper.
- Enabling application and tease your friends, near to their hair and create funny moments!
 
Sounds and vibration feels like you're getting a haircut to use it smartly to scare your friends. You can prank anybody that your mobile is a hair clipper machine. This will be as a hair cutter clipper, hair buzzer, hair trimmer app. Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise is one of the most realistic jokes apps, perfect for enjoyment and making things fun by definitely simulating hair trimmer, clippers, shaver, razors. Your phone will continually vibrate emitting sound and it feels like you're holding a natural hair clipper.
 
Everything that you need to do is to tap anywhere on the screen and your phone will be able to vibrate and to play a sound that is realistic as doing a real electric razor. Like a hair cutter clipper, hair buzzer, hair trimmer.
 
Hair Clipper Prank - Fake Razor Buzzing Noise is really good for pranking and making entertainment with your friends. With this app, you will be able to scare anybody that you can do haircutting to him(or her). joke your friends as using a hair cutter clipper, hair buzzer, hair trimmer. You can change the machine sounds from Settings.
 
✸ Vibration
✸ 6 different machine sounds
This will be a nice joke to your friends as a hair clipper, hair trimmer, haircutting clippers, hair buzzer.
NOTE:
1- This application does not help you to cut someone's hair. It just makes the same sound and vibration what razor machines do. Please consider this before you review the application.
2- This application is just for entertainment purposes. This is just a simulation application that is a prank on the phone.
playstore_details.summary: Turn your phone to a hair clipper prank, hair trimmer, hair buzzer and have fun
